content.description: Start the climb on a large, sloping ledge. Move up & right on a fun face to a move left. Continue up a dihedral to another transition and a final crux guarding the anchors.
content.location: Follow the canyon 7-8 minutes until you see the formation on the right. Traverse & scramble up slabs to a cool cave and the start.

content.description: Amazingly varied climbing on a north-facing wall! Climb up a dihedral then move onto a steep face. Continue up limestone-like features to a mantle & rest. Gun up the hanging arete to increasingly difficult moves & a sting in the tail. May be dirty from lack of traffic.
content.location: Continue up the canyon past "Wolfesbane" for another 8-10 minutes until the canyon narrows. Follow cairnsand trail left to the nose of a wall. continue right for another 2-3 minutes to the dihedral with lots of bolts above.

content.description: Secluded side canyon with two known routes on the south-facing side.
